mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NUM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, TO_CHAR(BOARD_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BOARD_CREATE_DATE, BOARD_READ_CNT, CATEGORY_NUM FROM BOARD_TEST WHERE CATEGORY_NUM = #{categoryNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_TEST ( BOARD_NUM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_CONTENT, CATEGORY_NUM ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(BOARD_NUM) + 1, 1) FROM BOARD_TEST), #{boardTitle}, #{boardWriter}, #{boardContent}, #{categoryNum} )
mapper.select: SELECT CATEGORY_NUM, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_NUM FROM BOARD_TEST WHERE BOARD_NUM=#{boardNum} AND CATEGORY_NUM=#{categoryNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_COMMENT( COMMENT_NUM, BOARD_NUM, COMMENT_CONTENT, COMMENT_WRITER, ) VALUES( #{commentNum}, #{boardNum}, #{commentContent}, #{commentWriter} )
